msg: Fix an unhelpful error message ("svn: Warning" on a single line) when

author: gradha
msg: Book Spanish. Removed one TODO, added another one.

author: sussman
msg: Locking branch:  fix mod_dav_svn<->svnserve interop problems with repos locks.
For an explanation of this change, see the mail thread at
(svn_fs_base__unparse_lock_skel):  write "0" or "1" into new lock-skel field.
(is_valid_lock_skel):  look for one more atom in the skel.
(XML_COMMENT_KEY):  new hash key for boolean field.
(write_lock_to_file):  write "0" or "1" to new field in lock-file.
(dav_svn_open_lockdb): look for new option header, set field in baton.
(dav_lock_to_svn_lock): take info context as input param.  when
writing a lock to repos, use the new helper
funcs to detect XML wrapping, and possibly
(svn_lock_to_dav_lock): when reading a lock from repos, notice new boolean
field and possibly re-add the XML wrapping.
is being made by an svn client.
(pre_send_hook):  always send new header option when doing a LOCK request.
